column4: I just installed 12.10 and my eth0 interface is getting an address but I can't ping anything.  If I go into windows its fine, Is there a noted issue with 12.10 and wired networking?
I changed to use opendns and I have not had any issues since
it's just 2 dns servers you change to. 208.67.222.222, 208.67.220.220
